description: Numbers n such that n remains prime through 3 iterations of function f(x) = 5x + 8.
comments: n, 5*n+8, 25*n+48 and 125*n+248 are primes. [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 04 2010]
mathematica: it3Q[n_]:=AllTrue[Rest[NestList[5#+8&,n,3]],PrimeQ]; Select[ Prime[ Range[ 3500]],it3Q] (* The program uses the AllTrue function from Mathematica version 10 *) (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Jul 21 2015 *)
prog: (MAGMA) [n: n in [1..150000] | IsPrime(n) and IsPrime(5*n+8) and IsPrime(25*n+48) and IsPrime(125*n+248)] [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 04 2010]
author: _David W. Wilson_
